scripts.migrate: docker run --rm -v $PWD/db/migrations:/flyway/sql -v $PWD/db/flyway.conf:/flyway/conf/flyway.conf --env DB_HOST --env DB_PORT --env DB_NAME --env DB_USER --env DB_PASSWORD --env DB_SCHEMA flyway/flyway:10 migrate
scripts.migrate:info: docker run --rm -v $PWD/db/migrations:/flyway/sql -v $PWD/db/flyway.conf:/flyway/conf/flyway.conf --env DB_HOST --env DB_PORT --env DB_NAME --env DB_USER --env DB_PASSWORD --env DB_SCHEMA flyway/flyway:10 info
scripts.migrate:repair: docker run --rm -v $PWD/db/migrations:/flyway/sql -v $PWD/db/flyway.conf:/flyway/conf/flyway.conf --env DB_HOST --env DB_PORT --env DB_NAME --env DB_USER --env DB_PASSWORD --env DB_SCHEMA flyway/flyway:10 repair
